title: The top of the top
text: I'have been in London last weekend to visit some friends. Looking at the various opportunities, I decided to book Pulman Hotel St. Pancras for my stay. The reviews on this hotel were positive, and after my experience, I can definitely confirm it. I checked in quite late in the evening, and I was kindly welcomed by a lady that gave me full explanation on the hotel facilities. Regarding the room and the hotel services: the bad was awesome , the breakfast rich and delicious, the restaurant staff always smiling and friendly. Sunday morning for the check out, I have been assisted by a front desk agent, whose name was Alim, that was behaving in a very professional way, and looked really concerned about my satisfaction. I received the invoice via e-mail, so no waste of time and paper. I suggest Pulman Hotel for both business and leisure stays.
